pages.text: 35|21|beiyin he dang yang ye bu xiangdeng,
35|22|huo ren he siren ye bu xiangdeng. An la bi shi ta suo yiyu zhe neng tingwen, ni jue buneng shi zai fen zhong de ren neng tingwen,
35|24|Wo que yi shi ni ben zhenli er wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe. Meiyou yige minzu ze yi, zhiyao you yige minzu, qizhong jiu you jinggao zhe cengjing shiqule.
35|25|Ruguo tamen fouren ni, name, zai tamen zhiqian shiqu zhe, yi fourenle; tamen zu zhong de shizhe ceng zhaoshi tamen mingzheng, tian jing he canlan de jingdian.
35|26|Ranhou, wo cheng fa liao bu xindao zhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de?
35|27|Nandao ni hai bu zhidao ma? An la cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, ranhou jie yushui er shengchan chu ge zhong guoshi. Shanshang you bai de, hong de, gese de tiaowen, he qihei de yanshi.
35|28|Renlei, yeshou he shengchu zhong, ye tongyang di you butong de zhonglei. An la de puren zhong, zhiyou xuezhe jingwei ta. An la que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi she de.
35|29|Songdu an la de jingdian, qie jin shou bai gong, bing mimi de huo gongkai di fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu zhe, tamen xiwang zhe jingying bu pochan,
35|30|yibian ta shi tamen xiangshou ziji de wanquan de baochou, bing ba ta de enhui jia ci tamen; ta que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de.
